greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: triangle A062111 reversed.
formula: Define the array B(n,p) = (Sum_{k=0..n} binomial(p+k,p) * T(n,k))/(n+p+1) for n >= 0 and p >= 0. Then see the comment of Robert Coquereaux (2014) at A193844. Conjecture: B(n+1,p) = A(n,p). (End)
maple: A062111 := proc(n,k) (k+n)*2^(k-n-1) ; end: A152920 := proc(n,k) A062111(n-k,n) ; end: for n from 0 to 15 do for k from 0 to n do printf("%d,",A152920(n,k)) ; od: od: # _R. J. Mathar_, Jan 22 2009
mathematica: t[0, k_] := k; t[n_, k_] := t[n, k] = t[n - 1, k] + t[n - 1, k + 1]; Table[t[n - k, k], {n, 0, 10}, {k, n, 0, -1}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Sep 11 2016 *)
results.author: _Paul Curtz_, Dec 15 2008
